pages.text: $(italic)You'd almost think this enchantment breathes a little bit of life into your tools.$(br2)Like a living creature, the tool gradually gets used to the block you are mining and specializes in it. In return, however, the mining of other blocks becomes slower.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Decreased mining speed. Speed increases with each block mined of the same type.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to mining tools.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Efficiency.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Inertia by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Inertia from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
